description:
Serena has a body to die for, but instead we torment this whore to the point of total destruction. She starts tied to a bench and her clothes are slowly removed to expose her hot, all natural body. The torment ramps up and then this whore is rewarded with a first of many orgasms.
Next I put her amazing ass in the air, fill her ass with an ass hook, spank the hell out of her ass, and torment her fragile feet. Her screams are heard all over the building, yet it won't stop me from continuing to make her suffer.
With a body like Serena's, I thought that it would be a waste to not stretch her out and display this helpless whore. She is in an inverted spread eagle suspension, and I assault her entire body with vicious double flogging. One in each hand doubles her pain and takes her closer to the ledge.
In the final scene, Serena is as helpless as she could possibly be. She is defenseless to the pain and agony that comes next. She's a tough slut, but in the end I tormented her so much that she needs quite a bit of time to recover.
title: The Submission of a Brat
